text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1998. ==Events== *13 March - Mélanie Cohl is selected to represent Belgium at the 1998 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Dis oui". She is selected to be the forty-first Belgian Eurovision entry during Eurosong held at the RTBF Studios in Brussels. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1980s=== *VTM Soundmixshow (1989-1995, 1997-) ===1990s=== *Samson en Gert (1990–present) *Familie (1991–present) *Wittekerke (1993-2008) *Thuis (1995–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths==
title: 1998 in Belgian television
